thread.title: A flower wall, champagne and a photo booth! Inside Mark Wright's 30th birthday party
thread.title_full: A flower wall, champagne and a photo booth! Inside Mark Wright's 30th birthday party

author: Jessica Gibb
title: A flower wall, champagne and a photo booth! Inside Mark Wright's 30th birthday party
text:
A flower wall, champagne and a photo booth! Inside Mark Wright's 30th birthday party Jessica Wright shared epic “group selfie” from the bash Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jess Wright wishes her brother Mark a happy 30th birthday Share this video Get daily   
Mark Wright celebrated his 30th birthday this weekend – and his wife Michelle Keegan and sister Jessica Wright went all out for the bash. 
Taking to Instagram, former TOWIE star Jessica shared an epic group selfie from the party. 
Birthday boy Mark looks over the moon as he cuddles up to his stunning wife in the snap. Mark Wright celebrated his 30th Birthday with his wife Michelle Keegan (Photo: Instagram) 
Meanwhile, Jessica – who is currently starring in ITV’s Dance Dance Dance – gives her best pout in a plunging black lace-up top. 
“Group selfie! What an amazing night celebrating Marks 30th!!” Jessica commented on the selfie shared with her 1.2m followers on Instagram. 
“Today has consisted of food & sleep! Now chilling waiting for @dancedancedance! Someone gets eliminated tonight who will it be???? @itv 6.30pm!” Michelle Keegan and her sister-in-law Jessica Wright enjoy the party (Photo: Instagram) 
Mark’s youngest sister Natalya, 16, also enjoyed the party. 
Posing against a wall of white flowers, the teen stunned in a black feather-detail dress. 
Earlier in the week, Mark and Michelle were seen canoodling over cocktails in Miami – shutting down the break-up rumours that have hounded them in recent months. NATALYA WRIGH`T (Photo: Instagram) 
Wearing a blue shirt while clutching a martini glass, hunky Mark looked a little worse for wear in the sweet snap. 
Meanwhile, former Corrie star Michelle - also sipping on a strong drink - was blurry-eyed but beaming. 
Fans were quick to compliment the duo, adding: "The most beautiful couple ever," while another added: "Gorgeous photo of you both. Enjoy your birthday celebrations. Love you guys." Mark and Michelle enjoyed drinks in Miami (Photo: Instagram/wrighty_) 
Just a few days earlier Stockport-born Michelle was seen joining Mark's USA trip after dazzling viewers in her role as Tina Dean in ITV biopic Tina and Bobby on Friday night. 
Mark, who praised his wife on social media after the show aired, is in the states as he films his brand new TV show. Like us on Facebook
